data.description: Introduction to various technical processes and aspects of painting. Studio practice, lectures, discussions, and critiques.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO PAINTING

data.description: Color phenomena and visual perception as applied in art problems. Lectures, readings in theory, philosophy, and history of design.
data.title: COLOR

data.description: To develop perceptions, use of perspective, line, light and dark, development of space, and expressive qualities in drawing.
data.title: DRAWING I

data.description: Explore the drawing process through projects that address one or more formal, technical, and/or conceptual issues. The concept of drawing as a vehicle for conveying ideas will be addressed through the study of composition, illusional space, perspective and proportion, and the analysis of form.
data.title: DRAWING METHODS & CONCEPTS
